alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:18PM EDT until August 11 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Livingston County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 918 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fowlerville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fowlerville around 930 PM EDT. Cohoctah around 945 PM EDT. Howell and Oak Grove around 950 PM EDT. Hartland and Brighton around 1015 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Parkers Corners, Lakeland, Plainfield, Chilson, Unadilla, Conway Township, Hell, Tyrone Township and Deerfield Township. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
